verses.text: As the \w hart|strong="H0354"\w* \w panteth|strong="H6165"\w* after the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w brooks|strong="H0650"\w*, so \w panteth|strong="H6165"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* after thee, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 42.1 \ft Maschil…: or, A Psalm giving instruction of the sons, etc\f*\f + \fr 42.1 \ft panteth: Heb. brayeth\f*

My \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w thirsteth|strong="H6770"\w* for \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, for the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*: when shall I \w come|strong="H0935"\w* and \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*?

My \w tears|strong="H1832"\w* have been my \w meat|strong="H3899"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w* and \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, while they \w continually|strong="H3117"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Where \add is\add* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*?

When I \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* these \add things\add*, I pour \w out|strong="H8210"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* in me: for I had \w gone|strong="H5674"\w* with the \w multitude|strong="H5519"\w*, I \w went|strong="H1718"\w* with them to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, with the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w joy|strong="H7440"\w* and \w praise|strong="H8426"\w*, with a \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* that kept \w holyday|strong="H2287"\w*.

Why art thou cast \w down|strong="H7817"\w*, O my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*? and \add why\add* art thou \w disquieted|strong="H1993"\w* in me? \w hope|strong="H3176"\w* thou in \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: for I shall yet \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* him \add for\add* the \w help|strong="H3444"\w* of his \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w*.\f + \fr 42.5 \ft cast: Heb. bowed\f*\f + \fr 42.5 \ft praise: or, give thanks\f*\f + \fr 42.5 \ft for the…: or, his presence is salvation\f*

O my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* is cast \w down|strong="H7817"\w* within me: therefore will I \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* thee from the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, and of the \w Hermonites|strong="H2769"\w*, from the \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w Mizar|strong="H4706"\w*.\f + \fr 42.6 \ft the hill…: or, the little hill\f*

\w Deep|strong="H8415"\w* \w calleth|strong="H7121"\w* unto \w deep|strong="H8415"\w* at the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of thy \w waterspouts|strong="H6794"\w*: all thy \w waves|strong="H4867"\w* and thy \w billows|strong="H1530"\w* are \w gone|strong="H5674"\w* over me.

\add Yet\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w command|strong="H6680"\w* his \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w* in the \w daytime|strong="H3119"\w*, and in the \w night|strong="H3915"\w* his \w song|strong="H7892"\w* \add shall be\add* with me, \add and\add* my \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* unto the \w God|strong="H0410"\w* of my \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.

I will \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0410"\w* my \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*, Why hast thou \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* me? why \w go|strong="H3212"\w* I \w mourning|strong="H6937"\w* because of the \w oppression|strong="H3906"\w* of the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*?

\add As\add* with a \w sword|strong="H7524"\w* in my \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*, mine \w enemies|strong="H6887"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2778"\w* me; while they \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* unto me, Where \add is\add* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*?\f + \fr 42.10 \ft sword: or, killing\f*

Why art thou cast \w down|strong="H7817"\w*, O my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*? and why art thou \w disquieted|strong="H1993"\w* within me? \w hope|strong="H3176"\w* thou in \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: for I shall yet \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* him, \add who is\add* the \w health|strong="H3444"\w* of my \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w*, and my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
